data.meta_description: Is the climate in Omsk (in Russia) in october good? Discover the weather forecast in october 2024 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Omsk in october: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Omsk?

Weather in Omsk in october 2024

The weather in Omsk in the month of october comes from statistical datas on the past years. You can view the weather statistics the entire month, but also navigating through the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Omsk in october

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Omsk in october.

The climate of Omsk in october is very bad

the weather in Omsk in october is relatively dry (with 45mm of precipitation over 3 days). The situation is deteriorating compared to the previous month since in september there is an average of 36mm of precipitation over 2 days.

The climate is rather cold in that area october. Plan a sweater! Temperatures are up to 7°C. In the morning the temperature drops to 3°C. Thus, the mean temperature average in october in Omsk is 5°C. Note that these seasonal averages are in contrast with those observed in Omsk in the month of october with a maximum record of 22°C in 2018 and a minimum record of -14°C in 2014. You can expect to have about 11 days with temperatures down below 0°C, or 35% of time.

On average, in Omsk, the days of october last 10:32. The sun rises at 07:36 and sets at 18:08.

Omsk: another month?

If you can push the dates of your trip to Omsk forward, the month of november has a better weather forecast than october. more information

October: another location in Russia?

If you want to go to Russia in october, there are destinations with better weather than Omsk:

In october, Sochi, Anapa, Gelendzhik, Izberbash, Krasnodar and Makhachkala have good weather.

Finally, Vladivostok, Kaliningrad, Volgograd, Astrakhan, Azov and Belgorod have a tolerable climate, but better than Omsk.

more information about Russia's weather in october

Weather data for Omsk in october:

Weather data for Omsk for october are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Omsk. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Omsk can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Omsk.
